sentence: Pool complimentary bike for 3 hours location staff

Belmont Park San Diego Zoo SeaWorld Marina Downtown lots to do and see Option for self service laundry complimentary coffee tea in the lobby additional food options for families and additional concierge staff
The service and quality of the hotel are excellent
The pool was lovely daily bike rental with stay room cozy staff at your service
The room service was superb and the view was amazing
Fantastic views great environment and the ambience wonderful staff
Custom omelets and wonderful service
We had a great time with my friends and the service and food was excellent
Friendly service and very accommodating I was able to do early check inn also was a grate breakfast lots of parking and grate view room was big
The rooms are beautiful and the staff is friendly and kind
HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE customer service
11 am the front desk was staffed with one person for a line of people checking out
I have not given up on Hyat thanks to staff in Emeryvile and in Houston but the manager at the Mission Bay location should be ashamed of himself
From the minute you check in at the front desk all the way down to the Housekeeping staff this property offers it all
Fortunately they were able to move us to the 12 floor the next night and the staff tried to be as accommodating as possible
Service was good food was good room was a little worn down and had some peeling paint and stained carpet
The staff was friendly but even they could not make up for the disappointing accommodations
The staff at the front desk was friendly but did not always seem to know what they were doing
By the way we purchased our tickets at the concierge station at the hotel
The food at the restaurant was fresh and very good as it is usually at Hyat but I guess that the service people needs to be more cheerful
Had to go to the front desk several times and have to sit on Hold with my bank
In 3 nights stay I never received housekeeping services
When you are arriving for a conference have enough people on staff to assist with the unloading of ones automobile when it has to go to the conference area
However this hotel used to have a consistensy and quality of staff that I do not see anymore
I would recommend if you are going to stay here that you inquire if any Teen sports teams are in town

The sofa is a hide a bed but there are no linens pillow or blankets in the room for it so if you ’re going to use the hide a bed ask for “ supplies ” when checking in otherwise the front desk may forget to bring them to you
At check in there was some confusion about some additional fees but it was quickly resolved Great service
The rooms are not throughly clean front desk does not care the only answer they seem to know is no we do not have that or No we do not do that STAY AWAY
Very few nearby restaurants have to go into town or order delivery
Right by lift and ice machine everyone back and forth on concrete corridor lots of staff in and out of door opposite
